attributes.action: MPs to only use the NHS, as they are responsible for maintaining the NHS
attributes.additional_details: MPs committing to only use the NHS will should they have faith in the NHS and the public can too
attributes.background: To prove the NHS is fit for purpose by committing to use only the NHS.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether to receive healthcare through the NHS or privately are a matter for every individual, including MPs, not the UK Government or Parliament.
